view.name: biome_slots_density
view.query: SELECT Biome, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Small', 1, 0)) as Small, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Medium', 1, 0)) as Medium, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Small, Medium', 1, 0)) as SmallMedium, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Medium, Large', 1, 0)) as MediumLarge, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Creature', 1, 0)) as Creature, PRINTF("%.4f", AVG(Density)) as AvgDensity, PRINTF("%.4f", SUM(Density)) as TotalDensity FROM distinct_entries GROUP BY Biome ORDER BY Biome

view.name: biomes
view.query: SELECT Biome FROM EntitySlots GROUP BY Biome ORDER BY Biome

view.name: distinct_entries
view.query: SELECT * FROM EntitySlots GROUP BY InstanceId, WorldPos

view.name: duplicates
view.query: SELECT *, COUNT(*) FROM EntitySlots GROUP BY InstanceId, WorldPos HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

view.name: slotcount_per_biome
view.query: SELECT Biome, SlotType, COUNT(*) FROM distinct_entries GROUP BY Biome, SlotType ORDER BY Biome

view.name: slotcount_per_biome_per_type
view.query: SELECT Biome, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Small', 1, 0)) as Small, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Medium', 1, 0)) as Medium, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Small, Medium', 1, 0)) as SmallMedium, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Medium, Large', 1, 0)) as MediumLarge, SUM(IIF(SlotType LIKE 'Creature', 1, 0)) as Creature FROM distinct_entries GROUP BY Biome ORDER BY Biome

view.name: slotcount_per_cell
view.query: SELECT Batch, Cell, Biome, SlotType, COUNT(*) FROM distinct_entries GROUP BY Batch, Cell, Biome, SlotType ORDER BY Biome
